question: Which is the basin country of the "Cenderawasih Bay"?
explanation: Indonesia is the basin country of the "Cenderawasih Bay". Cenderawasih Bay, also known as Sarera Bay, is a large bay in the Northern Province of Papua and West Papua, New Guinea, Indonesia. Teluk Cenderawasih National Park is located in the Teluk Cenderawasih. In the Cenderawasih Bay, extensive coral reefs exist. Parts of the area have been declared a protected marine reserve of 1.5 million hectares, the largest natural park in Southeast Asia. The western part of the bay was declared a marine national park in 2002.
